### Total Alignment Score Calculation
The total alignment score is calculated by averaging the scores of all elements:
\[ \text{Total Score} = \frac{\sum \text{Element Scores}}{\text{Number of Elements}} \]
\[ \text{Total Score} = \frac{1.0 + 1.0 + 0.666667 + 1.0 + 1.0 + 1.0 + 0.666667 + 0.833333 + 0.833333 + 0.666667 + 0.5}{11} \]
\[ \text{Total Score} = \frac{8.333334}{11} \approx 0.757576 \]
